The setup gnome to allow you to connect as root.
It's in the menu that allows you change the settings.

It's on the top tool bar.
On the top tool bat in gnome desktop.  Click 4th from the left.  It's in the settings.
It's where you change the gnome settings.
It will bring up a window with about 6 tabs.  One allows you to logon as root.
